title: Episode 641 - A Plea To Taco Bell
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss why Taco Bell is straight up f**king us all over with the removal of menu items such as the loaded grillers and nachos supreme, people are raging over “Jump out boys” arresting criminals in Portland, Oregon, RBG is...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss why Taco Bell is straight up f**king us all over with the removal of menu items such as the loaded grillers and nachos supreme, people are raging over “Jump out boys” arresting criminals in Portland, Oregon, RBG is back in the hospital for recurring cancer, the truth has come out about Bubba Wallace’s character, and the two are sure that Aaron Rodgers is most likely gay.
